results.name: Motzkin numbers (A001006) mod 8.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
S.-P. Eu, S.-C. Liu, and Y.-N. Yeh, Catalan and Motzkin numbers modulo 4 and 8, Europ. J. Combin. 29 (2008), 1449-1466.
Christian Krattenthaler, Thomas W. Müller, Motzkin numbers and related sequences modulo powers of 2, arXiv:1608.05657 [math.CO], 2016-2018.
E. Rowland and R. Yassawi, Automatic congruences for diagonals of rational functions, J. Théorie Nombres Bordeaux 27 (2015), 245-288.
Ying Wang, Guoce Xin, A Classification of Motzkin Numbers Modulo 8, Electron. J. Combin., 25(1) (2018), #P1.54.
maple: f:= rectoproc({(3+3*n)*a(n)+(5+2*n)*a(1+n)+(-4-n)*a(n+2), a(0) = 1, a(1) = 1}, a(n), remember): seq(f(n) mod 8, n=0..200); # _Robert Israel_, Mar 16 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 16 2018
